name: kpt-functions-catalog-docs

author: KPT Authors

scripts.gen-docs: node index_generator.js Source > ../sources/_index.md; node index_generator.js Sink > ../sinks/_index.md; node index_generator.js Generator > ../generators/_index.md; node index_generator.js Transformer > ../transformers/_index.md; node index_generator.js Validator > ../validators/_index.md
